page.title: 20W.Ashby Farmhouse 1985
page.content: Lincs. farmers' wives lead a very different life from that of 50 years ago.Today they live in labour saving houses with every modern convenience. Domestic help is scarce,but with elec- tricity,piped water and the telephone life is much easier than it ever was, but life on the farm is still busy.Chi -ldren living in rural areas have to be taken to and from school.Apart from routine housework, visits to the near- est town for shopping and farm buisn- ess, the farmers' wife finds time to participate in local activities,e.g. P.T.A, church life,W.I.,flower clubs and farm women's clubs.Some sit on local councils and on school governing bodies.Some help on the farm in the busy time,others when the family is grown up and independent take up professional,part time or voluntary work.
